Key: ...It's morning.
What time is it―Oh God, look at the time!
Wh-Why didn't anyone wake me―

(I rushed to grab my uniform, and glanced over at the
calendar.)
...Oh, today's my day off.
Oh... Man, that scared me...

But regardless... Why hasn't anyone come to wake me
up yet?

(Usually someone would already be in my room by
now...)
Come to think of it, where are Kotori and Tohka?
No one's... here?
...Are they both out?
...Hold on a moment!
Coming!
K-Kurumi? Wh-What are you doing here?!
Oh? You're acting quite strange.

Shido-san, is it that weird for your girlfriend to
come pay you a visit?
Wh-What?! Girlfriend?!

(Seeing my reaction, Kurumi tilted her head in
confusion.)
My, is that really something to be surprised over?

Shido-san, you're my boyfriend. It's been a while
since we started dating.

Oh... That's right, huh... Sorry, I just woke up, so I
guess I'm still out of it.
Gosh, could you not inflict such pain to my heart?
Um... Sorry, Kurumi...
Is that all?
Huh...?

(Seeing my reaction, Kurumi dramatically put both
hands over her chest.)

My love for Shido-san came to fruition and we were
finally able to date...

...And this is how you treat me? That is too cruel.
It's so terribly unfortunate.
I'm so sorry... It completely slipped my mind...

So my feelings are something that just slips your mind
when you awaken... I'm so sad. I'm going to cry.
H-Hey... Kurumi?! Wh-What should I do...

(I didn't know what to do and panicked, but Kurumi had
a mischievous smile on her face.)
(Seems like she was playing with me.)
...Gosh.

I'm really sorry, Kurumi. I'll do anything to make it
up to you!

(Saying I'd do anything might be dangerous, but I need
Kurumi to forgive me.)
So please, don't be upset.
Oh, so you'll really do anything?
Uh...
S-Sure. If it's within my abilities.

(Kurumi accepted my words and smiled happily, clapping
her hands together.)
Then... I want you to go on a date with me.
What? Right now?
Oh, you won't? So were your words all lies?
Shido-san, you really don't care about me...
Ah, I'm so sad. I'm going to cry.
N-No... That's not true!
Okay, fine. Let's go on a date!
(Worst case, we can just hang out at home...)

...Shido-san, I hope you're not thinking that we could
just stay here at your house.
O-Of course I'm not!
Then let's go. Hehe.

(I feel like she managed to slip this through, but it
wasn't that difficult of a request so I guess it's
fine.)

Th-Then Kurumi... I'll go get ready. Can you wait in
the living room?
Sure.
Oh... Did you eat breakfast already?
No, not yet.

Then let's eat together. As soon as I get changed, I'll
make it quickly.

Sure, I'd love that. I'd never turn down an invitation
from you.

(That made me happy, and I ran to my room with a
lighter step than earlier.)

(After I got ready, I made a simple breakfast to eat
with Kurumi before we went to the shopping district.)
It sure is a nice day.
It sure is.
Shido-san... Where do you want to go first?

Hmmm. Is there any place in particular that you'd like
to go?
Anywhere is fine.
...What? A-Anywhere...
Anywhere is fun, as long as I'm with you.

(Kurumi looked up at me with innocent eyes, and her
cheeks were faintly flushed with pink.)
(Seeing Kurumi like that made my heart flutter.)
Is something the matter?
Oh, um...
H-Hmm. Let's just walk around for now.
Hehe. Well then, please lead the way.

(Kurumi's gentle gaze made me blush, so I went to
scratch my cheek, but... something soft kept me from
moving.)
K-Kurumi?
Hehe... Is something the matter?
Well... Um...

(Kurumi entwined her arm around mine. I could feel
warmth on my arm, and wavered.)

We're dating. It's natural for me to lock arms with
you.
Huh... R-Right!
You're right! We're dating, so it's only natural, huh?

(I tried to convince myself by answering
energetically.)
Heh... Shido-san, you're such an honest person.
Y-Yeah...
Now, Shido-san... Let's go.
Got it.
(And so our date began.)

Kurumi, it's almost lunch time. Do you want to eat
anything?
I'll leave it up to you today.

I see. Then... My favorite place is nearby, so let me
take you there.
Your favorite place, huh? Hehe... I can't wait.
Hey, Shido-san? There actually is something I want.
Something you want? Sure. Where are we going?
Can you follow me to this store?

Sure thing. But what are you looking for? Clothes?
A hat?
No, what I want today is a swimsuit.
Oh, I see. A swim―Wait, a swimsuit?!
Is there a problem?
No, but...

You'll pick out a swimsuit that will suit me, won't
you?
What the...?!

I know it's off-season, but please take me to Ocean
Park some time.

Or... Would you rather choose lingerie for me like on
our last date?
C-Come on, give me a break!
Well, I'm not completely joking here.

I would wear any underwear you chose for me,
Shido-san...
A-Any... underwear?
Yes. I'd be happy to wear whichever one you liked.

(Kurumi looked at me with a sensual smile. I
suddenly pictured her in immodest underwear and
gulped.)

―Hah, no, no! Forget about that. Let's just buy what
we came here for!
Hehe. Don't be so coy...
D-Don't make fun of me!
My, but I'm really not.
A-Anyways... We're going to go buy a swimsuit, right?
Yes. I'd like that.
W-Well... that's fine, then.
Hehe.
...Ah, look at the time.
It went by so quickly.
I know...

(A sudden date with Kurumi. In the end, it was a lot
nicer than I expected. I stopped and gave a big yawn.)
Man, we sure did do a lot today.

(After we shopped, we ate lunch and shopped again.
We then went into a café to rest. Nothing special,
but it was fun.)
Yes, so it seems.
(Kurumi then stopped and peered into my face.)
I, too... had a lot of fun today.

(And she gave me the biggest smile of the day. I felt
her steal my heart for a second.)
Oh...
...Shido-san? Is something the matter?

(Kurumi noticed my gaze and gave a naughty smile
as she whispered into my ear. I gulped.)
Oh, um... Err...
...Um, it makes me... happy that you'd say th―
(Before I could continue...)
...Huh?
(I saw Tohka and Kotori in my line of vision.)
Kotori, Tohka...

(Before I knew it, I whispered their names. They
were walking together with a big bag. It seemed like
they've been out shopping since this morning.)

(Neither of them noticed us. They were laughing and
talking as they headed home.)
What's the matter...?

(From afar, they looked like sisters. I couldn't help
but smile seeing that.)
...Shido-san? Is something the matter?
(Kurumi noticed and jumped into my line of vision.)
Whoa...?!
What caught your attention?

Oh, um... Sorry. Anyways, back to what we were
saying―
Hey, Shido-san. What were you looking at earlier?
Oh, well, um...

Y-You see, Tohka and Kotori just passed by. They've
been missing since this morning, so I was curious what
happened.
U-Um... Kurumi-san?

(Kurumi had her usual bewitching smile as she stared
at me. Could she be mad?)
Just apologize
Stay quiet and see how she reacts

(Seems like she's mad. I don't know why, but I think I
should just apologize. I bowed down to Kurumi.)
Kurumi... Um, sorry.

...Shido-san, I don't think you did anything you need
to apologize for.
But I was with you, so...

I thought you were mad because... Um... We kind of
stopped mid-conversation.
Kehe. Kehehe... I suppose.

(Her laugh seems very scary...! This isn't good.
Seriously, not good at all!)
U-Um... I'm really sorry!

Hehe... Gosh, Shido-san. You're apologizing in such
a weird way.
S-Sorry...
I guess I'll let this slide for today.
I'm so glad...
(It really seemed dangerous a second ago.)

Yes. But I must punish you, Shido-san, for ignoring
a girl's heart.
P-Punish?!

It's not that big of a deal. I'm going to leave a mark
on you.
A mark...?
Come this way...
Oh, Kurumi?
Kurumi... What do you plan on doing here?
And what did you mean by "mark"...?
You'll know in just a second.
Shido-san, come this way.
O-Okay.

(I did as I was told and moved toward Kurumi. She
suddenly put her arms around me.)
H-Hey, K-Kurumi?!
(Kurumi put her arms around me, and―)
Muah...
Hyauh?!
(Kurumi suddenly kissed my neck.)
Shido-san, you're screaming like a girl...
W-Well... I mean...

(Any healthy boy would scream if someone did that
to them so suddenly.)

(But it's true. I was so surprised that my voice shot
up.)
Hehe. That was cute. Very adorable.
K-Kurumi. Wait―
Muah, muah―
Kuuu...! S-Stop it...

(Kurumi now licked the area she just kissed. A warm
and comforting feeling danced across my neck―)
Won't let you.
Whoa...?!

(The feeling of Kurumi's beautiful, soft body, her
sweet scent―I felt her all over my body.)

(Every time Kurumi's tongue grazed me or her lips
touched me, I could see sparks coming out of my
eyes, and my consciousness was about to go.)
*sigh*... K-Kurumi, no... You can't do any more...
Hehehe... Shido-san, you coward.
Then, I guess I'll make my mark soon.
Huh...?
The mark that will prove that you are mine―
H-Hey... Kurumi?!
It'll be over soon. So just stand still.
―Mmmmuuuaaaaah!

(Just then, I felt a jolt of pain. It felt like a kiss
from a vampire as Kurumi sucked on my neck.)
...*grunt*.
(As I felt the sweet pain, Kurumi's lips left me.)
...Shido-san, now you are mine.

(Kurumi whispered in my ear, satisfied. She finally
let go of me... and slowly started to walk.)

(She seemed mad. I didn't want to make excuses and
upset her more, so I decided to see how she reacted.)

(As we looked at one another, Kurumi suddenly looked
away. She seemed a little troubled.)
...Will you not continue where you left off?
Huh? Oh... r-right.

(Seems like she forgave me. For a second, she looked
like she was pouting, but it was surprisingly cute.)
U-Um...

Well... If you had fun today Kurumi, that makes me
really happy.
That's what I wanted to say earlier.

(I scratched my cheek while I said it, and for a
second Kurumi's eyes sparkled as she gave me a
warm smile.)
...Gosh.
If you say that, Shido-san, how can I not forgive you?
Kurumi...
But Shido-san. I don't want to share you with anyone.
Huh...?

(Kurumi looked even more bewitching than usual and
walked up to me.)
Shido-san?
Can you close your eyes just a little?
—Huh?! Wh-What are you going to do?
That's... for you to find out.
Now, now. Hurry and close your eyes.
Now...
O-Okay.

(She looked at me with puppy dog eyes. She was so
cute, I did as I was told and closed my eyes.)
...Th-They're closed.
Muah...
Whoa?!
(Kurumi suddenly kissed me.)
Hey. K-Kurumi?!
This is proof of contract.
...Huh?
Proof that you and I are connected, Shido-san.

So, Shido-san... I'll put a mark on you so it's even
clearer to see.
Proof... that you belong to me... Hehehe.
Kurumi...
Mm...
*grunt*... Ah...
You feel me, don't you? That makes me happy...
Fuun... Hm...
Oh. K-Kurumi...

(Kurumi's soft lips and warm tongue touched the base
of my neck. Every time she moved, I felt an electric
sensation go through me.)
I love you... I love you so much, I can't help it.
―Muah.
―*grunt*!

(I felt pain shoot up my neck. It's as if a fang just
bit into me. But the pain was just for a split-second.)
...Hehe. This makes you all mine, Shido-san.
―Huh?

Hehe. It's almost time. Shall we go together...
Shido-san?

(Kurumi muttered next to my ear, satisfied, and
silently stepped away from me... She began to walk
away as if she were doing a light dance step.)

(And so our date ended. I should have been the one
to walk her home, but for some reason she walked me.
I didn't want that, but I guess she lived further...)
...Hehe. I really had fun today.
That makes me happy.
Hey, Shido-san?
What is it, Kurumi?

I want to hurry and wear the swimsuit you chose for
me.

So next time, I want us to go somewhere I can wear
my swimsuit.
Of course.
Hehe. That makes me happy.

(Kurumi then put her finger on her lips and gave a
mischievous smile.)
Oh...

(Seeing Kurumi's lips as pink as cherry blossoms, I
remembered what we had just done, and blushed.)
Shido-san?
Y-Yeah?!
Don't hide that mark, okay?
Huh... Mark?

Hehe. You'll know when you look in the mirror. I'll be
off now.
H-Hey, Kurumi?

(And with that, Kurumi smiled and walked off before I
could stop her.)

(After Kurumi left, I looked in the mirror and
verified the so-called mark she mentioned.)

(On my neck was Kurumi's proof―a red hickey.
The mark of her kiss etched deeply into my skin.)

(It goes without saying that Kotori totally got me
later.)
